author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
What's up gang! We're back with the monthly MONDAY SHOW where we hang out Live on YouTube to discuss the comings and goings of the Wargaming Industry this month, chat about what's going on at GMG, take questions from the Mailbag and generally wrap up June! 

So let's sit back, chat and discuss what's going on in the world of Tabletop. 

PATRONS: The Mailbag is in the usual spot!

Support Ash on Patreon!
patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames

Ash on META
facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Inside Tabletop
youtube.com/@GMGInsideTabletop

title: THE MONDAY SHOW  06-23-25 Monthly FREE-PISODE
